entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
